name: Crowdhelix Limited
goal: The Crowdhelix Network is a collaboration platform for research organisations and companies participating in the Horizon 2020 EU funding programme. Crowdhelix acts as a hub linking excellent Horizon 2020 participants from universities, research organisations and SMEs, and works to maximise the value and Horizon 2020 funding its members can obtain. Crowdhelix coordinates a group of European research and innovation specialists forming a "policy hub". This is a group of national and European R&I policy experts that discuss and advise on Horizon 2020 matters at both the programme and policy level. Crowdhelix Limited is a limited company incorporated in England and Wales for this purpose.
euInitiatives:
Horizon 2020, the EU Framework Programme for Research and Innovation.
Horizon Europe
